summary:
Roles & Responsibilities

    Writing efficient, reusable, testable, and scalable code
    Understanding, analysing, and implementing – Business needs, feature modification requests, conversion into software components
    Integration of user-oriented elements into different applications, data storage solutions
    Developing – Backend components to enhance performance and receptiveness, server-side logic, and platform, highly responsive web applications
    Use tools and methodologies to create representations for functions and user interface of desired product
    Develop high-level product specifications with attention to system integration and feasibility
    Enhancing the functionalities of current software systems
    Working with Python libraries and frameworks

This Role Requires:

    5+ years of software development experience
    Python fundamentals and programming
    AWS cloud management and architecting enterprise data solutions
    Prior experience in automated build pipeline, continuous integration, and deployment
    Experience with Finance product / software preferred
    Experience with Node.js
    Web frameworks and RESTful APIs experience
    Code packaging, release, and deployment management
    Database knowledge in PostgreSQL, MySQL, relational database, etc.
    Ability to integrate databases and various data sources into a unified system

Looking for Python developers.

Experience of 1 to 4 years in Python Development.

Skills : Python, Pandas, Numpy, Any database experience

Data Manipulation and Analysis: Skilled in Pandas and NumPy have expertise in working with data structures, manipulating data, and performing data analysis tasks. Using Pandas for data manipulation, cleaning, and transformation, while NumPy is used for numerical computing and array operations.

Will consider only immediate or 15 days joiners only.

Interested folks can directly share your CV to pooja@kognosdat.com

Job Title: Python Flask Developer
Position: Software Engineer
Experience: 4- 7 Years
Category: Software Development/ Engineering
Main location: India, Pune, Bangalore
Position ID: J1223-1108
Employment Type: Full Time

We are looking for an experienced Python Flask Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate should be passionate about coding and developing scalable and high-performance applications. You will work closely with our other members of the team to deliver quality solutions that meet the needs of our clients.

7+ years of relevant Python Application development experience.

    Creating applications and packages with Python 3
    Experience working in fast- paced project delivery using AGILE methods
    Strong software development skills, knowledge of best practices (SOLID, CI/CD, MS DevOps pipelines etc.)
    MS Azure experience e.g. virtual networks, key vaults and storage, security
    MS SQL backend development experience
    Experience in developing APIs in python using FastAPI/Django/Flask
    Hands on in ADF and Azure Databricks
    Web development with Python
    Basic understanding of the WebSockets protocol
    Knowledge of the OAuth2 and web security
    Basic knowledge of modern JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js
    Kubernetes containers
    Basic knowledge in numerical calculus, such as multi-dimensional function interpolation, numerical differentiation
    Knowledge of physical commodities trading markets and organisations (esp. LNG/ gas/oil).
    Data Engineering experience blended along with core software engineering experience
    Data manipulation with Pandas
    Python: Bokeh visualization, Tornado web framework, asyncio programming, Azure Python API
    Hashicorp Terraforms (azurerm)
    Kafka Confluent
    Conda package management
    ReactJS front end development experience

Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience with Python and Django framework.
Proven experience in designing, developing, and deploying microservices in an AWS environment.
Solid understanding of RESTful API design principles and best practices.
Familiarity with containerization technologies such as Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.
Experience with AWS services, including but not limited to Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently and collaboratively.
Excellent communication skills and a proactive approach to learning and professional development

Job Description & Responsibilities:
Create formal test plans and test reports and ensures they have the correct approvals.
Coaches and mentors test team members the importance of testing.
Responsible for test planning.
Creates and Maintains the test strategy, documents it.
Should be responsible for maintaining the test cases in test management tools such as ALM and fetching test execution Reports, Requirement traceability matrix etc. from it.
Estimate user stories/features (story point estimation) and tasks in hours with the required level of accuracy and commit them as part of Sprint Planning.
Provides test coverage reports/automates test cases percentage.
Ensures high quality deliverable is passed on to UAT phase for stakeholders testing.
Provides test evaluation summary report (test metrics) for the release.
Works with the Product Owner to confirm that the acceptance tests reflect the desired functionality.
Raises any impediments/risks (technical/operational/personal) they come across and approaches Scrum Masters/Technical Architect/PO accordingly to arrive at a decision.
Collaborate with other team members on various aspects of development/integration testing etc. to get the feature working on is delivered with quality and on time.
Tests features developed by developers throughout sprints to ensure working software with high quality as per acceptance criteria defined is released as per committed team sprint objectives.
Plan how the features will be tested and should manage the test environments and be ready with the test data.
Understands requirements, they create automated test cases thereby ensuring regression testing is performed on a daily basis. Checks in code into the shared source code repository regularly without build errors.
Design, develop and maintain automation test scripts using Selenium.
Have a good understanding of the product features and customer expectation. They ensure all the aspects of the functionality is tested before passing it for UAT.
Defect logging and tracking in the tools such as Jira, ALM etc.

Key Responsibilities :


    Develop and implement algorithms to solve complex problems efficiently.


    Design, build, and maintain scalable systems and web applications using Python.


    Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate algorithms into software solutions.


    Optimize existing algorithms for performance and scalability.


    Conduct code reviews, provide feedback, and mentor junior developers on algorithmic best practices

Greetings from Web Idea Solution!!

Job Title: Python Developer

Job Description:

We are seeking an experienced Python Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Python development, a passion for creating efficient and maintainable code, and the ability to work collaboratively within a cross-functional team. As a Python Developer, you will be responsible for designing, coding, testing, and debugging software applications, as well as maintaining and enhancing existing systems.

Must have skills requirements :

    Reading and understanding existing code base (Very imp.)
    API: Graph QL
    Python
    Web Development: Flank/Fast API
    SQL Database (Read & Write) Any database
    B2C Past Experience

Good to have Skills :

    SQL Alchemy - Good to have
    Ownership and Prompt in delivery

Key Responsibilities:

Software Development:** Design, develop, and maintain Python-based software applications, ensuring high performance, responsiveness, and scalability.

Code Review:** Collaborate with team members to conduct code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and maintain code quality standards.

Database Integration:** Integrate Python applications with various databases, such as SQL, NoSQL, and ORM frameworks.

API Development:** Create and maintain RESTful APIs for data retrieval and manipulation, ensuring compatibility with front-end applications.

Testing and Debugging:** Write unit tests and perform debugging to identify and resolve software defects and issues.

Documentation:** Create and maintain technical documentation, including code documentation, API documentation, and system architecture documentation.

Performance Optimization:** Identify and address performance bottlenecks in Python applications and implement optimization strategies.

Collaboration:** Work closely with cross-functional teams, including front-end developers, designers, and product managers, to deliver high-quality software products.

Version Control:** Utilize version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage code repositories and collaborate effectively with team members.

Qualifications:

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).

- Proven experience as a Python Developer, with a strong portfolio of Python-based projects.

- Proficiency in Python programming, including knowledge of Python frameworks (e.g.,, Flask/ First API ) and libraries.

- Familiarity with front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and the ability to collaborate with front-end developers.

- Experience with databases and database design, including SQL and NoSQL databases.

- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

- Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

Requirements:

    Proficient in developing a dynamic web app with Django framework following best coding practices
    Basic architecture design knowledge in building scalable web app
    Code deployment on production server
    Knowledge of security and data protection
    Integration of data storage solutions
    Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
    Good knowledge in developing RESTful APIs for the backend system and comfortable in using Git version control
    Proficient understanding of database modelling and query optimisation and good at work around them
    Fluency with the command line interface
    Familiarity with Linux like operating systems
    Good understanding about Data Structures and Algorithms
    Familiarity with optimising web application to improve the performance
    Proficient understating of data modelling and entity modelling
    Knowledge of any other web related technology is a bonus

Responsibilities:

    Develop and optimise application
    Debug code, code comments and clear code
    You will be responsible for developing a new application and adding new enhancements and features to the existing applications ensuring performance, responsiveness, and availability to the users
    Optimise application for maximum speed, scalability and availability
    Collaborate with other team members

v In-depth knowledge in Core Python with Django building end to endapplications development.


v Experience in Web technologies-HTML, CSS, Javascript.


v Database - SQL Server/Postgres/ NoSQL database.


v Good understanding of Algorithms, data structures.


v Knowledge in ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries.


v Experience in integrating multiple data sources and databases into onesystem.


v Knowledge in REST / SOAP API


v Knowledge in version control tools like Git

v Experience with various cloud technologies.


Qualifications


graudate

Role Definition: Python Developer

Responsibilities:

Software Development:Write, test, and maintain high-quality Python code.
Develop new features and functionalities for software applications.

Web Development (if applicable):Use Python web frameworks like Django or Flask to build web applications.
Implement and maintain RESTful APIs for seamless communication.

Database Management:Work with various databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB.
Design, implement, and optimize database schemas.

Testing and Debugging:Write unit tests to ensure the reliability and functionality of code.
Debug and resolve software defects and issues.

Collaboration:Work closely with cross-functional teams, including front-end developers, designers, and product managers.
Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality standards.

Documentation:Create and maintain technical documentation for code, APIs, and software functionalities.
Document code changes and updates for reference.

Continuous Learning:Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and new technologies.
Continuously improve coding skills and adapt to evolving development practices.

Deployment:Deploy applications to production environments and ensure scalability.
Collaborate with DevOps teams for smooth deployment processes.

Troubleshooting and Support:Provide support for production issues and troubleshoot problems.
Collaborate with support teams to address customer-reported issues.

Code Optimization:Optimize code for performance, scalability, and efficiency.
Identify and address bottlenecks in the software.

Python/ JAVA developer

Primary Responsibilities:
We are looking for a Java/Python Development Engineer who can take ownership for the whole end to end delivery, performing analysis, design, coding, testing, and maintenance of large-scale and distributed applications. The successful candidate will be a highly motivated team player and is likely to have significant experience in application development, a strong technical background and good communication skills. He/she will interact directly with the users and with other technologists across the firm when using their framework/software.
Skills required (essential):Excellent working knowledge of the following technologies: Java, Databases, Middleware (Soap/Xml/Messaging/RESTful services). Work experience with Python, Shell scripting. Sound understanding of Object Oriented Analysis, Design and Programming, familiarity with Design Patterns.

    A good knowledge of Unix/Linux platform-Experience developing client-server, distributed, real-time, performance-critical, highly available, or large-scale systems-Experience building real time applications in Multithreading for a Unix/Linux platform-Experience working with the Spring framework-Experience working with Source Code Management solutions like (ex. Git)-Proficiency with Enterprise level database (ex. Oracle, SQL Server, Sybase, DB2).-Version control (e.g. Git)-Experience in either IntelliJ or Eclipse IDE-Experience testing software (e.g. Unit testing, using frameworks, performance testing/tuning)-Experience debugging or performing issue diagnosis. Experience of iterative / agile development practices. Exposure to working in a global delivery team.Comfortable with direct interaction with the business users at all levels. Excellent written and verbal communication skills


Mandatory Skills

Java/Python Development Engineer
Java, Databases, Middleware (Soap/Xml/Messaging/RESTful services
Unix/Linux

1. Job Title: Python developer

Education: Any Graduate – BTech CSE / IT / ECE, MTech CSE / IT / ECE

Experience: 1-2 years

Job Location: Calicut

Job type: Permanent

Work schedule: Full time

Job Description:

Software Developer

Develop and maintain applications for the web and mobile platforms. Work with some of the leading cutting-edge technologies.

Skills required:

    Python Programming: Proficiency in Python is fundamental. You should be comfortable with Python syntax, data structures, and common libraries.
    Object-Oriented Programming (OOP): Understanding of OOP principles is crucial for structuring Python code effectively.
    Version Control: Familiarity with version control systems like Git and the ability to work collaboratively using tools like GitHub or GitLab.
    Web Development: Basic knowledge of web development concepts, including HTTP, web frameworks like Django or Flask, and HTML/CSS.
    Database Management: Experience with working with databases, both SQL (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB).
    APIs: Ability to consume and create RESTful APIs. Understanding how to make HTTP requests and handle responses in Python.
    Debugging: Strong debugging skills to identify and resolve issues in code effectively.
    Package Management: Knowledge of Python package management tools like pip and virtual environments (e.g., virtualenv, conda).
    Data Manipulation: Familiarity with data manipulation libraries such as NumPy and Pandas for working with structured data.
    Cloud Providers: Familiarity with major cloud providers like Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), or others. Understanding the services they offer and how to use them is valuable.
    Linux/Unix Skills: Proficiency in using the command line, working with Linux/Unix systems, and basic shell scripting.
    Documentation: The ability to write clear and concise code documentation and other technical documents.
    Security Awareness: Understanding of common security practices and potential vulnerabilities in software development.
    Frameworks and Libraries: Depending on your specific role or project, you may need to learn and work with specific Python libraries and frameworks relevant to your domain (e.g., data science, machine learning, web development).

Other Requirements:

Should have a good academic track record. [Candidates having arrears can also apply for the job].

Should be willing to serve the company for a minimum of 2 years.

Should be hard working, positive thinkers, willing to learn new technologies.

Should have good problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Should possess good communication skills.

Should be a continuous Learner.

Should be a team player.

Annual CTC:

2.52L to 3.60L

Interview rounds:

Aptitude test

Technical interview

Final interview with CEO

Company Address

Software Associates - WeMakeIoT

Mascot, Zilla Bungalow Road,

Next to M.E.S Women’s College, Nadakkavu, Calicut

Key Responsibilities:
Design and implement efficient, scalable Python code, focusing on algorithms, HTTP REST APIs, and Asyncio.
Develop and maintain robust Azure Cloud-based solutions and integrations.
Optimize existing systems for scalability and performance, utilizing Azure Cloud services.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.
Ensure the reliability and security of applications in the Azure Cloud environment.
Stay abreast of developments in Azure services and cloud computing.
Required Skills & Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Python Developer with a strong background in algorithms, HTTP REST APIs, Asyncio, and Azure Cloud.
Deep understanding of Python and its frameworks and libraries.
Proficiency in Azure Cloud services and architecture.
Solid grasp of object-oriented programming and software design patterns.
Experience with code versioning tools, such as Git.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
Preferred Skills:
Certifications in Azure Cloud technologies.
Experience with containerization technologies like Docker, Kubernetes.
Knowledge of database technologies (SQL and NoSQL).
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and test-driven development.

Job Description:

Must Haves:

    Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
    At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a software developer
    2+ years experience working with Python and Python for Data Science.
    Excellent spoken and written English communication skills
    Notice Period: Immediate

Summary:

A reputable company with rapid growth that specializes in creating conversational AI chatbots or companions that are individualized through the use of language models and deep learning algorithms, is looking for a Python Developer. The developer will be in charge of optimizing the program to run as quickly and as scalable as possible. The company provides a distinctive and customized engagement experience by providing a range of services, including education, entertainment, and customer care. This is an innovative opportunity for candidates who are eager to learn in a fast-paced environment.

Job Responsibilities:

    Write code that is clear, reusable, and maintainable.
    Take part in code reviews to uphold the requirements for code quality
    Possess the ability to code in Python
    In the responses, provide well-structured, accurate, and easily annotate/classifiable code that is straightforward and clean

Job Requirements:

    Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
    At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a software developer
    Extensive experience working with Python and Python for Data Science
    Familiarity with SQL and QA is desirable
    Nice to have some Software Quality Assurance and Test Planning experience
    Proficiency with the language's syntax and conventions
    Previous experience tackling algorithmic problems
    Extensive data science or data engineering is desirable
    Strong background in application engineering
    Excellent spoken and written English communication skills

Mandatory Tech Skills :

5+ Years

    Project Experience in API Development with Flask,
    Strong knowledge in Python Pandas,
    Strong in SQL Query development,
    SQL Query Optimization

Optional:

    Redis (only for 5 plus years’ experience) but should capable of learning Redis quickly
    If Candidate, less than 5 years’ experience, then Redis experience is mandatory.

JOB DESCRIPTION

Skill: Python Developer

EXP: 6 + Yrs

Key responsibility:

1. Design and implement server-side logic using Python, specifically with frameworks like Flask and Django.
2. Utilize GitLab for version control, ensuring effective collaboration and code management within the development team.
3. Demonstrate proficiency in Oracle Database to manage and optimize database functionality.
4. Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements and ensure seamless functionality.
5. Ensure high performance and responsiveness of applications developed.
6. Exhibit strong problem-solving skills to address challenges in the development process.
7. Work effectively in an agile development environment, adapting to changing requirements and priorities.
8. CICD Pipeline setup and troubleshooting with vulnerabilities.
9. Knowledge of tools like SonarQube, Checkmarx, X-ray Scan or similar.
10. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and contribute to the overall architecture of the applications.
11. Participate in the full software development lifecycle, from planning and design to deployment and maintenance.
12. Good to have knowledge on any subscription model.

About Virtusa

Teamwork, quality of life, professional and personal development: values that Virtusa is proud to embody. When you join us, you join a team of 36,000 people globally that cares about your growth — one that seeks to provide you with exciting projects, opportunities and work with state of the art technologies throughout your career with us.

Great minds, great potential: it all comes together at Virtusa. We value collaboration and the team environment of our company, and seek to provide great minds with a dynamic place to nurture new ideas and foster excellence.

Key Responsibilities

    Contribute to various aspects of our trading systems: real-time monitoring, scrapers, data processors, visualization, and execution bots.
    Design and implement robust systems ensuring resilience under challenging conditions.
    Collaborate with data scientists to deploy trading strategies.
    Integrate systems with new exchanges and providers.
    Optimize codebase for speed, reliability, and expand test coverage.

Requirements

    2+ years of software development experience.
    Proficiency in Rust and Python with the ability to write robust and efficient code.
    Strong grasp of async programming, multithreading, and debugging tools.
    Experience in performance enhancement and working with databases like PostgreSQL, ClickHouse.
    Familiarity with Python data science packages (Pandas, Numba) is advantageous.

Job Description: Clark Technology (clarktn.com) is seeking a Senior Data Engineer with a strong background in Python and its libraries, SQL, Excel, and ideally VBA. This role is perfect for a problem-solver who thrives in developing complex data solutions and providing insightful analyses that drive strategic business decisions. As a key player in our data-driven initiatives, you will be involved in high-impact projects and collaborate with various teams.

Key Responsibilities:

    Design, build, and maintain robust data pipelines.
    Expertly analyze and interpret complex data sets to produce actionable insights.
    Develop and optimize database systems for enhanced performance and reliability.
    Seamlessly integrate systems and data with cross-functional teams.
    Uphold the highest standards of data integrity and security.
    Continuously update knowledge on emerging data engineering trends and technologies.

Qualifications:

    Extensive experience in Data Engineering.
    Proficiency in Python, SQL, Excel, and VBA (preferred).
    Demonstrated experience in handling large-scale data projects.
    Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills.
    Familiarity with cloud services, database technologies, and ETL processes.
    Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

Requirements:

    Fluency in English with outstanding communication skills.
    Access to a reliable high-speed internet connection.
    Willingness to work Eastern Standard Time hours.
    A strong sense of teamwork with the ability to work independently.

We Offer:

    The flexibility of remote work.
    Opportunities for professional development and growth.
    A collaborative, inclusive, and innovative work culture.
    Competitive salary and benefits package.

YOUR ROLE
As an Application Development Analyst, you will have proven software development skills, strong math skills and will ideally have had some exposure to finance or accounting-related systems. In this role you will be able to immediately contribute with solid experience in system operations, development and on-going support as well as have the financial acumen to quickly learn basic investing concepts. From job scheduling, data feeds, and production operations... to requirements, design, coding, interfaces, and data flows... to troubleshooting and root-cause analysis, you will be challenged to contribute.

YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES

    Collaborate with Investments Operations, Accounting and Controllership teams to construct long term IT solutions to support Genworth’s investment goals
    Support the operation and maintenance of Genworth Investments Trading & Accounting Platform
    Manage the day- to-day operation and coordination of IT processes and enhancements
    Code and maintain custom or canned reports, system interfaces and extracts
    Create interfaces and load-scripts to ancillary financial and reporting systems
    Coordinate with project, support, and business analysts to deliver new or enhanced application code solutions
    Collaborate with Business Analysts to create technical/functional test plans and scripts to validate design, development and implementation of system/reporting deliverables and obtain user sign-off
    Monitor IT processes and ensure successful completion of production daily and monthly runs
    Support the Genworth Investments and accounting functions by troubleshooting and performing root cause analysis of application problems. Identify action items and make recommendations to address process and/or coding issues
    Monitor process metrics and initiate process improvement efforts for IT processes
    Coordinate the conversion of accounting interfaces, reporting and downstream extracts to the new Enterprise Data Management environment


YOUR QUALIFICATIONS

    Bachelor’s degree in a computer science.
    2+ years minimum as Applications Developer
    Solid understanding of relational databases, SQL statements, PL SQL Procedures, ETL data transformations, shell scripts, JAVA scripts, etc.
    Experience and working knowledge in Data Warehouse and ETL tools/technologies.
    Ability to troubleshoot and solve complex technical problems.
    Demonstrated expertise in developing automated jobs
    Working knowledge of software development life cycle (SDLC) & Agile methodologies
    Experience in developing and/or supporting Accounting, Finance or Investments systems
    Experience working with business users.
    Proven history of detail-oriented execution and commitment to customer satisfaction.


PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

    2 years of experience developing complex Finance, Investments, Portfolio Management and/or Capital Markets systems
    Good understanding of Microsoft .Net framework, C#, VB.Net or ASP.Net
    Experience with accounting principles, practices, and methodologies
    Experience in working with data feeds, such as Bloomberg, Thomson Reuters, Markit, or similar
    Java and/or Python experience


WHY GENWORTH?

    We have a real impact on the lives of the people we serve
    We work on challenging and rewarding projects
    We give back to the communities where we live
    We offer competitive benefits including:
    Medical and Life Insurance
    Annual Leave up to 25 business days
    Parental Leaves: Maternity, Paternity, Adoption
    12 Casual leave days per year
    12 Sick leave days full pay per year
    11 Paid Holidays per year
    Utility Allowance for Telephone and Internet
    Employee Assistance Program
    Business Travel Accident Insurance
    Gratuity Eligibility
    Retirement Saving Plans
